records.Answer__c:
Mutation can be a tough thing.  We know that you may have to be away for weeks, depending on the severity of the mutation.  And these can be painful and often times dangerous.

We see mutation as a way of investing in our heroes--after all, for many of us, this is where we get our powers to be our best on the job.

Fill out the mutation leave form, and get approval from your manager.  We want to give you the time for this intense personal growth, but also need to make sure we cover your planned missions, and that the rest of the squad knows where you are and why.
records.Title: Mutation Leave

records.Question__c: How do I troubleshoot my headphones?
records.Answer__c:
Listen Responsibly

To avoid hearing damage, make sure that the volume on your music player is turned down before connecting your headphones. After placing headphones in/on your ears, gradually turn up the volume until you reach a comfortable listening level. Noise levels are measured in decibels (dB), exposure to any noise at or above 85 dB can cause gradual hearing loss. Monitor your use; hearing loss is a function of loudness versus time. The louder it is, the less time you can be exposed to it. The softer it is, the more time you can listen to it. 



Use Responsibly

Do not use headphones when it’s unsafe to do so—while operating a vehicle, crossing streets, or during any activity or in an environment where your full attention to your surroundings is required.

It’s dangerous to drive while wearing headphones, and in many places, illegal because it decreases your chances of hearing life-saving sounds outside of your vehicle, such as another car’s horn and emergency vehicle sirens. Please avoid wearing your headphones while driving. Use an FM transmitter to listen to your mobile media devices instead.

Learn how to establish a safe listening level and review other important safety guidelines from the Consumer Electronics Association at www.ce.org and the Deafness Research Foundation at www.drf.org.
records.Summary: Basic Maintenance and Troubleshooting for your Headphones
records.Title: *Headphone Troubleshooting*

records.Question__c: How do I Track my Shipment Status?
records.Answer__c:
How to track your FedEx Package

Below is the procedure to track your FedEx package. If you are still unable to find your package, then contact FedEx Customer Support
  1. Step 1

    Locate your tracking or reference number from your package airbill.

  2. Step 2

    Navigate to the FedEx Web site (see Resources).

  3. Step 3

    Enter the tracking number or reference number in the space provided. You can enter up to 30 tracking or reference numbers at one time.

  4. Step 4

    Click on "Track" to view the tracking information about your package.

Things You'll Need:

  • FedEx account if you do not have the tracking numbers
  • Computer with Internet access
  • E-mail account if you wish to use the track by e-mail feature
  • Your FedEx airbill number, tracking number or reference number
records.Summary: Its quick and easy to track your FedEx shipment status
records.Title: How do I Track my Shipment Status*

records.Question__c: How do I get more information on your products?
records.Answer__c:
Frequently Asked Questions About the Updated Privacy Statement

Why has the Privacy Statement changed?

Salesforce.com has updated its Privacy Statement in a new format that allows individuals to more quickly find relevant information about salesforce.com’s information handling practices.

Additionally, the Privacy Statement has been updated to more clearly distinguish between information salesforce.com hosts on behalf of its customers (“Customer Data”) and information salesforce.com collects from individuals who visit the Company’s Web sites or register to use the Company’s services (“Data About salesforce.com Customers”). Please note that the updated Privacy Statement does not make any changes to salesforce.com’s use of Customer Data.

What changes have been made to the Privacy Statement?

The updated Privacy Statement states that salesforce.com may combine Data About salesforce.com Customers with Web Site Navigational Information. Data About salesforce.com Customers includes information salesforce.com collects when individuals express an interest in obtaining information from the Company or registering to use the Company’s services. Web Site Navigational Information includes information salesforce.com collects from individuals who browse the Company’s Web sites using commonly-used information gathering tools, such as cookies and Web beacons. By combining Data About salesforce.com Customers with associated Web Site Navigational Information, salesforce.com can provide you with a more personalized experience.

To whom does the updated Privacy Statement apply?

The updated Privacy Statement will apply to all visitors to salesforce.com’s Web sites and customers of salesforce.com’s services.

When do the revisions take effect?

The updated Privacy Statement becomes effective on July 02, 2008.

Can I view the previous Privacy Statement?

The previous Privacy Statement is available here.

Who can I contact if I have questions?

Contact salesforce.com Privacy by clicking here.
records.Title: How do I get more information on your products?
